attributes.action: Money to train more breastfeeding peer supporters instead of paying women to breastfeed
attributes.additional_details:
We would like the government to fund more peer supporter breastfeeding training. so that there is much better support and information available for women in those first crucial couple of weeks of breast-feeding.
So that women who struggle have some support and are less likely to give up.
This petition has been started as women do not give up because of money they give up as they often need help and there is not enough available when they are starting their breastfeeding journey.
